title: Collaborative Learning-Based Simulation/VR Science Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level theoretical understanding of scientific fields and basic laboratory skills
context.additional_context: Performance of collaborative tasks based on real scientific scenarios for workplace integration by employed learners

learning_goals: Learners successfully perform scientific problem-solving processes in VR simulation environments at an 80%+ success rate through 3-person group tasks.
Learners enhance collaborative learning efficiency by 70%+ through peer feedback and role allocation.
Learners share experimental data at 100% completion using collaborative learning tools (digital whiteboards, collaboration platforms) in blended (online/offline) environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
